uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.ncwms

Class NcwmsCatalogue

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.catalogue.DataCatalogue
      • uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.ncwms.NcwmsCatalogue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CatalogueConfig.DatasetStorage, DatasetCatalogue, FeatureCatalogue, WmsCatalogue

    public class NcwmsCatalogue
extends DataCatalogue
implements WmsCatalogue
    An extension of DataCatalogue to add WMS-specific capabilities for ncWMS.
    Author:
    Guy Griffiths
